name: part_001
file: tmp_【THE DEVIL WEARS HOPE 3D LIVE】 IRyS Anniversary LIVE #DevilWearsHope [RQn7biOiqHs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'My Dearest' by IRyS.
Performance of the song 'Akuma no Ko' (The Devil's Child) by IRyS.

subtitles.original: みわたせば
subtitles.english: If I look around...

subtitles.original: また笑って
subtitles.english: ...and you smile again...

subtitles.original: 守るべき大事なものが今あって
subtitles.english: There is something important I must protect now

subtitles.original: だけどなすすべもなく立ち尽くす時は
subtitles.english: But when I stand still with no way to act

subtitles.original: 可能性を失って暗闇が君を
subtitles.english: When you lose all possibility and darkness

subtitles.original: 覆い隠し絶望に飲み込まれるそんな時は
subtitles.english: Covers you and you're swallowed by despair

subtitles.original: 私が君を照らす明かりになるから
subtitles.english: I will be the light that illuminates you

subtitles.original: たとえこの世界の王にだって消せはしない
subtitles.english: Even for the king of this world, it won't be extinguished

subtitles.original: So, everything that makes me whole
subtitles.english: So, everything that makes me whole

subtitles.original: 今君に捧げよう
subtitles.english: I'll dedicate it to you now

subtitles.original: I'm Yours
subtitles.english: I'm Yours

subtitles.original: ねぇ この世界にはたくさんの
subtitles.english: Hey, in this world there is so much

subtitles.original: 幸せがあるんだね
subtitles.english: happiness, isn't there?

subtitles.original: いつか二人なら
subtitles.english: If it's the two of us someday...

subtitles.original: 誰かが君のことを嘘つきと呼んで
subtitles.english: Someone calls you a liar

subtitles.original: 心ない言葉で傷つけようとしても
subtitles.english: And tries to hurt you with heartless words

subtitles.original: 世界が君のことを信じようともせずに
subtitles.english: Even if the world refuses to believe in you

subtitles.original: 茨の冠を被せようとしても
subtitles.english: And tries to put a crown of thorns on you

subtitles.original: 私は君だけの味方になれるよ
subtitles.english: I can be your only ally

subtitles.original: その孤独痛みを私は知っている
subtitles.english: I know that loneliness and pain

subtitles.original: So, everything that makes me whole
subtitles.english: So, everything that makes me whole

subtitles.original: 今君に捧げよう
subtitles.english: I'll dedicate it to you now

subtitles.original: I'm Yours
subtitles.english: I'm Yours

subtitles.original: いつか私を知ることができたなら
subtitles.english: If you are able to know me someday

subtitles.original: 必ずその場所に私はいるから
subtitles.english: I'll definitely be in that place

subtitles.original: そこに希望の欠片すらなかったとしても
subtitles.english: Even if there wasn't even a fragment of hope there

subtitles.original: 私があってはならないものであっても
subtitles.english: Even if I'm something that shouldn't exist

subtitles.original: 君は忘れないでいてくれることを
subtitles.english: Please don't forget that you will...

subtitles.original: 誰よりも私がそのことを知ってる
subtitles.english: I know that better than anyone

subtitles.original: だから私君のために全てを今
subtitles.english: So for your sake, I'll now... all...

subtitles.original: 捧げよう
subtitles.english: dedicate to you

subtitles.original: 鉄の弾が正義の証明
subtitles.english: An iron ball is proof of justice

subtitles.original: 貫けば英雄に近づいた
subtitles.english: If it pierces through, you've come closer to being a hero

subtitles.original: その目を閉じて触れてみれば
subtitles.english: If you close your eyes and try to touch it

subtitles.original: 同じ形 同じ体温の悪魔
subtitles.english: It's a devil of the same shape and temperature

subtitles.original: 僕はダメで あいつはいいの？
subtitles.english: I'm no good but they're okay?

subtitles.original: そこに壁があっただけなのに
subtitles.english: Even though there was just a wall there

subtitles.original: 生まれてしまった運命嘆くな
subtitles.english: Don't lament the fate you were born into

subtitles.original: 僕らはみんな自由なんだから
subtitles.english: Because we're all free

subtitles.original:
悪魔の子
Lyrics, Music: ヒグチアイ
subtitles.english:
The Devil's Child
Lyrics, Music: Ai Higuchi

subtitles.original: 鳥のように羽があれば
subtitles.english: If I had wings like a bird

subtitles.original: どこへだって行けるけど
subtitles.english: I could go anywhere

subtitles.original: 帰る場所がなければきっと
subtitles.english: But if I have no place to return to

subtitles.original: どこへも行けない
subtitles.english: I'm sure I won't be able to go anywhere

subtitles.original: ただただ生きるのは嫌だ
subtitles.english: I just don't want to simply exist

subtitles.original: 世界は残酷だ
subtitles.english: The world is cruel

subtitles.original: それでも君を
subtitles.english: Even so, I...
